trans-unit.source: Describes the console key that was pressed, including the character represented by the console key and the state of the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys.
The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> type is not intended to be created by users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>类型不应由用户来创建。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反，返回到调用的响应中的用户<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object describes the <xref:System.ConsoleKey> constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象描述<xref:System.ConsoleKey>常量和 Unicode 字符，如果有的话，对应于按下的控制台键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object also describes, in a bitwise combination of <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers> values, whether one or more SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象还中描述的按位组合<xref:System.ConsoleModifiers>值，是否一个或多个 SHIFT、 ALT 和 CTRL 修改键的同时按下控制台键。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>在读取操作中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character that corresponds to the <c>key</c> parameter.
The console key that corresponds to the <c>keyChar</c> parameter.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that a SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that an ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that a CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> structure using the specified character, console key, and modifier keys.
This type is not intended to be created by users.
trans-unit.target: 此类型不是由用户来创建。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反，返回到调用的响应中的用户<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> type does not specify whether the left or right SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>类型未指定左或向右的 SHIFT、 alt 键或 CTRL 修改键是否曾按下。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value of the <paramref name="key" /> parameter is less than 0 or greater than 255.
Gets a value indicating whether an object or specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
An object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象是否相等如果及其相应<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>属性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A> method performs slightly better than the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method because it does not have to convert `obj` to an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A>方法的性能略优于<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法因为它不具有要转换`obj`到的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object and is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象是否相等如果及其相应<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>属性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
The value returned by the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method is not suitable for distinguishing one <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object from another.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法不适合进行区分两个<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>从另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: If your application needs a unique hash code, override the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method with your own method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序需要的唯一哈希代码，重写<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法与你自己的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the console key represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
A value that identifies the console key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 标识曾按下控制台键的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A> property in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>在读取操作中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Unicode character represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
An object that corresponds to the console key represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 对应于由当前的控制台键的对象<see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" />对象。

trans-unit.source: If the key pressed does not map to a Unicode character (for example, if the user presses the **F1** key or the **Home** key), the value of the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A> property is \U0000.
trans-unit.target: 如果按的键不映射到 Unicode 字符 (例如，如果用户按下**F1**密钥或**主页**密钥) 的值<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>属性是 \U0000。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A> property to add the characters input by the user into a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>要添加用户的字符输入转换为字符串属性。

trans-unit.source: The example ignores special keys other than **ENTER**, **ESC**, and **BACKSPACE**.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将忽略特殊键以外**ENTER**， **ESC**，和**退格符**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> values that specifies one or more modifier keys pressed simultaneously with the console key.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> property in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>在读取操作中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> objects are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象是否相等如果及其相应<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>属性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.ConsoleKeyInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.ConsoleKeyInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> objects are not equal.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is not equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>对象是否相等如果及其相应<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>属性是否相等。
